name: I Did a Bad Thing.
description:
I Did a Bad Thing a narrative mystery puzzle game. IDABT slowly unravels a layerd mystery through puzzles, story, items and world building. The overarching story of IDABT is a fictionalized account of true events - a heinous murder/suicide in New England in 2007. This is the prologue demo. More episodes to be released upon continuing interest.

IDABT features original art, music and puzzles that may stretch beyond the boundaries of your device. The demo should provide about an hour or two of gameplay depending on your interest in ultra challenging puzzles. Think of it as Professor Layton, but in hell...and also you have no shoes.

*10/20/2016 - fix an issue with a missing sound effect causing save games to not load.
